health_discussed_people_names: Hon. Mwalimu, Hon. Fadhili Fadhili Makarani, Hon. Jimmy Odari, Hon. Eng. Makori
health_data_challenges: Lack of proper response from the Environment Committee regarding health issues in Changamwe
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: To provide healthcare services to community health workers without charging them fees, to address health issues affecting the people of Changamwe, and to have comprehensive reports on health-related matters
health_evidence_base: Feedback and reports from community health workers and residents of Changamwe
